医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
RIBMINS COST Action 讨论欧洲肉类安全系统的未来负责基于风险的肉类检验和综合肉类安全保证（RB-MSAS）的成本行动 RIBMINS 最近在布鲁塞尔组织了一次会议，与会者包括来自国际组织、行业、主管当局和学术界的利益相关者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/RIBMINS-COST-Action-discusses-future-of-meat-safety-systems-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/RIBMINS-COST-Action-discusses-future-of-meat-safety-systems-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5459572f-0b8a-465e-b82d-76e7ce50f16a Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:23:34 -0400 RIBMINS COST Action discusses future of meat safety systems in Europe
研究发现孤独的人以不同的方式看待世界俄罗斯作家兼哲学家列夫·托尔斯泰在写下《安娜·卡列尼娜》的开场白时可能已经说到点子上：“幸福的家庭都是相似的，不幸的家庭各有各的不幸。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Lonely-people-process-the-world- Differently-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Lonely-people-process-the-world- Differently-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e00272a-da7f-4178-bd59-c16b79d890b0 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:18:42 -0400 Lonely people process the world differently, study finds
研究揭示女大学生不健康饮食习惯和睡眠质量差一项横断面研究揭示了女性健康科学学院学生不健康的饮食习惯和饮酒情况，凸显了营养教育和生活方式干预的必要性。观察到常量营养素失衡、睡眠质量差和对地中海饮食的依从性低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-reveals-unhealthy-eating-habits-and-poor-sleep-quality-among-female-college-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-reveals-unhealthy-eating-habits-and-poor-sleep-quality-among-female-college-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de34886f-a476-4d3e-a589-a96e2d18a9ad Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:10:00 -0400 Study reveals unhealthy eating habits and poor sleep quality among female college students
简单的血液检测结合风险模型可改善肺癌死亡率预测德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员开发的基于血液的测试与个性化风险模型相结合，可以有效预测个体死于肺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Simple-blood-test-combined-with-risk-model-improves-lung-cancer-mortality-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Simple-blood-test-combined-with-risk-model-improves-lung-cancer-mortality-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=999f2506-9e19-4799-8d45-50801b51c3b0 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 21:05:56 -0400 Simple blood test combined with risk model improves lung cancer mortality prediction
新研究揭示长期新冠患者存在令人担忧的认知障碍持续的 COVID-19 症状可能会导致康复患者出现认知缺陷。这项系统综述强调需要进一步研究和干预措施来解决长期认知障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/New-study-reveals-alarming-cognitive-impairments-in-long-COVID-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/New-study-reveals-alarming-cognitive-impairments-in-long-COVID-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747c622a-b00a-44bd-a523-1ac5d5464fdd Wed, 28 Jun 2023 20:55:00 -0400 New study reveals alarming cognitive impairments in long COVID patients
研究全面总结了运动对 2 型糖尿病患者的益处对运动对 2 型糖尿病患者血糖水平产生积极影响的分析表明，虽然所有运动都有帮助，但某些活动及其时机对人们的健康极为有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-provides-a-compressive-summary-of-benefits-of-exercise-forpeople-with-Type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-provides-a-compressive-summary-of-benefits-of-exercise-forpeople-with-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15835120-620b-423b-b334-273ac5f47bb9 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 20:51:00 -0400 Study provides a comprehensive summary of benefits of exercise for people with Type 2 diabetes
实验性抗体治疗有望预防骨髓移植并发症在宾夕法尼亚大学医学院和丹娜法伯/波士顿儿童癌症和血液疾病研究人员领导的一项临床前研究中，实验性抗体治疗在很大程度上预防了肠道中称为移植物抗宿主病 (GVHD) 的骨髓移植并发症，且不会引起广泛的免疫抑制。中心并于今天发表在《科学转化医学》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Experimental-antibody-treatment-shows-promise-for-preventing-bone-marrow-transplant-complication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Experimental-antibody-treatment-shows-promise-for-preventing-bone-marrow-transplant-complication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4a7f7ae-7e92-4611-8ee8-71546938e193 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 14:38:45 -0400 Experimental antibody treatment shows promise for preventing bone marrow transplant complication
将药物输送到内耳的新方法可恢复失聪小鼠的听力一个国际研究小组开发了一种将药物输送到内耳的新方法。这一发现是通过利用大脑中液体的自然流动并在耳蜗中使用一种鲜为人知的后门来实现的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Novel-method-to-deliver-drugs-into-inner-ear-restores-hearing-in-deaf-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Novel-method-to-deliver-drugs-into-inner-ear-restores-hearing-in-deaf-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f3ec956-fe6b-4a1a-95b5-4fa95e6e783a Wed, 28 Jun 2023 14:33:21 -0400 Novel method to deliver drugs into inner ear restores hearing in deaf mice
研究发现电子烟警告标签中不确定的语言可能会让人感到困惑当谈到电子烟警告标签时，康奈尔大学研究人员组织的焦点小组的受访者明确表示：直接给我。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Uncertain-language-in-e-香烟-warning-labels-can-confuse-people-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Uncertain-language-in-e-香烟-warning-labels-can-confuse-people-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=487a0494-2ab3-4c49-9aa3-859167f569b8 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 14:17:29 -0400 Uncertain language in e-cigarette warning labels can confuse people, study finds
MUSC 外科医生警告说，肩部置换手术的 BMI 截止值可能会导致健康差异六月，美国医学会宣布了一项新政策，鼓励医生不要仅仅关注体重指数（BMI）作为体重和健康的决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/BMI-cutoff-for-shoulder-replacement-surgery-could-lead-to-health-disparities-MUSC-surgeon-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/BMI-cutoff-for-shoulder-replacement-surgery-could-lead-to-health-disparities-MUSC-surgeon-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e469563d-2eb2-4044-940b-7947​​cd39ef2c Wed, 28 Jun 2023 14:13:47 -0400 BMI cutoff for shoulder replacement surgery could lead to health disparities, MUSC surgeon warns
